name: Moonray
description: Moonray is a decentralized gaming and entertainment network, powered by $MNRY and supporting a wide range of projects in gaming, comics and animation. $MNRY is an ERC20 utility and governance token designed to empower the Moonray ecosystem. The token will have utility in the Moonray Game, Moonray Mobile and future games that are planned for development by Moonray Studio. The Moonray Game, the first game developed by Moonray Studio is a AAA, melee-style, arena combat PVP. Moonray catapults you into an otherworldly multiplayer combat arena, where intense, fast-paced battles demand mastery of both offense and defense. It is available now at the Epic Game Store.
